name: Before the Restless Keep
description:
Before the Restless Keep

A two player, medieval-style 2D platformer game made in Unity.

Lead the Knight and the Lady through the perilous path leading to the dreaded Restless Keep!

Collect all fragments to succeed.

This game was made in partial fulfillment of our Game Development subject.

It's a short game, but hopefully people will have a quick fun with it.

Made by Bojji and KnightOfArsford.

===================================

CONTROLS:

The Knight

WAD - Movement

S - Attack

The Lady

Arrow Keys - Movement

===================================

Music:

Stuck by LudoLoon Studio
